pooling.label: Pooling Strategy
pooling.info: How to pool token embeddings into a single vector representation. Use 'mean' for average context, 'max' for strongest signal, 'cls' for [CLS] token, 'attention' for attention-based pooling, 'last' for last hidden state.

normalize.label: Normalize Embeddings
normalize.info: Apply normalization to output embeddings. Recommended for cosine similarity. 'none' means no normalization. 'z-score' means standardize the embeddings to have a mean of 0 and a standard deviation of 1. 'min-max' means scale the embeddings to have a minimum of 0 and a maximum of 1. 'l1' means normalize the embeddings to have a sum of 1. 'l2' means normalize the embeddings to have a sum of 1.

device.label: Device
device.info: Device to run encoding on: 'auto', 'cpu', 'cuda' (GPU), or 'mps' (Apple Silicon).

batch_size.label: Batch Size
batch_size.info: Number of samples to encode per batch. Higher is faster if enough memory.

fp16.label: Use FP16 Precision
fp16.info: If true, use float16 for faster encoding on modern GPUs (CUDA or MPS).

max_length.label: Maximum Sequence Length
max_length.info: Max tokens per input. Longer texts are truncated or chunked.

truncation.label: Enable Truncation
truncation.info: If true, inputs longer than max_length are truncated. Otherwise, error or auto-chunk.

stride.label: Sliding Window Stride
stride.info: Stride for sliding window chunking if truncation is off.

special_tokens.label: Use Special Tokens
special_tokens.info: If true, adds special tokens (e.g. CLS, SEP) for BERT/Transformer models.

return_tensors.label: Return Tensors Type
return_tensors.info: Output type: PyTorch ('pt'), NumPy ('np'), or TensorFlow ('tf').

output_hidden_states.label: Return Hidden States
output_hidden_states.info: Whether to return all intermediate hidden states from the encoder.

aggregation.label: Aggregation Type
aggregation.info: Aggregation across multiple input segments (if input split).

top_k.label: Top-K
top_k.info: Sample from top K tokens. 0 disables.

top_p.label: Top-p (Nucleus Sampling)
top_p.info: Sample from the smallest set of tokens whose total probability â‰¥ p.

repetition_penalty.label: Repetition Penalty
repetition_penalty.info: Discourage model from repeating the same output. 1.0 means no penalty.

length_penalty.label: Length Penalty
length_penalty.info: Controls whether model prefers shorter or longer output.

no_repeat_ngram_size.label: No Repeat N-Gram Size
no_repeat_ngram_size.info: Model will not repeat any n-gram of this size.

max_length.label: Max Output Length
max_length.info: Maximum number of tokens to generate.

min_length.label: Min Output Length
min_length.info: Minimum number of tokens to generate.

num_beams.label: Beam Width
num_beams.info: Number of beams in beam search decoding. Higher = better, but slower.

early_stopping.label: Early Stopping
early_stopping.info: Stop generation early if all beams finish.

do_sample.label: Sampling
do_sample.info: If true, model samples randomly instead of greedy/beam search.

typical_p.label: Typical Sampling p
typical_p.info: Controls typical sampling, an alternative to nucleus sampling.

temperature_decay.label: Temperature Decay
temperature_decay.info: Decay temperature as tokens are generated.

prefix_allowed_tokens.label: Allowed Prefix Tokens
prefix_allowed_tokens.info: Comma-separated list of allowed prefix tokens.

splitter_type.label: Text Splitter
splitter_type.info: How to chunk the text. 'recursive' adapts to structure, 'sentence' for natural language.

chunk_size.label: Chunk Size
chunk_size.info: Size (in characters/tokens) for each text chunk.

chunk_overlap.label: Chunk Overlap
chunk_overlap.info: Amount of overlap (in characters/tokens) between consecutive chunks.

remove_empty.label: Remove Empty Chunks
remove_empty.info: Remove chunks that are empty or only whitespace.

min_chunk_length.label: Minimum Chunk Length
min_chunk_length.info: Minimum length (in characters) for a chunk to be retained.

merge_small_chunks.label: Merge Small Sections
merge_small_chunks.info: Merge short chunks into neighboring ones.

enhance_retrieval.label: Enhance for Retrieval
enhance_retrieval.info: Optimize chunks for search engine retrieval.

remove_special_chars.label: Remove Special Characters
remove_special_chars.info: Remove symbols and special chars from the text.

extract_key_sentences.label: Extract Key Sentences
extract_key_sentences.info: Identify and extract most important sentences from each chunk.

language.label: Language
language.info: Language of the document for preprocessing-specific handling.

sentence_splitter.label: Sentence Splitter
sentence_splitter.info: Which library/tool to use for sentence splitting.
